project.name: MRZScanner
project.description: MRZ Scanner reads all machine-readable zones on traveling documents following the ICAO 9303 Specification on Passports (2 – lines) for TD3 size Machine Readable Passports; MRV-B Visas (2 - lines) as described in part 7 of ICAO 9303 documentation; and ID cards (3 – lines) for TD1 size Machine Readable Travel Documents. The configuration supports OCR-B characters from ISO 1073-2 for use in MRTDs.
